## [Topics](/documentation/Swift/UInt/BinaryInteger-Implementations#topics)

### [Operators](/documentation/Swift/UInt/BinaryInteger-Implementations#Operators)

[`static func != <Other>(Self, Other) -> Bool`](/documentation/swift/uint/!=(_:_:)-4jpi0)Returns a Boolean value indicating whether the two given values are not equal.[`static func & (UInt, UInt) -> UInt`](/documentation/swift/uint/&(_:_:))Returns the result of performing a bitwise AND operation on the two given values.[`static func & (Self, Self) -> Self`](/documentation/swift/uint/&(_:_:)-1gv93)Returns the result of performing a bitwise AND operation on the two given values.[`static func * (UInt, UInt) -> UInt`](/documentation/swift/uint/*(_:_:))Multiplies two values and produces their product.[`static func + (UInt, UInt) -> UInt`](/documentation/swift/uint/+(_:_:))Adds two values and produces their sum.[`static func - (UInt, UInt) -> UInt`](/documentation/swift/uint/-(_:_:))Subtracts one value from another and produces their difference.[`static func == <Other>(Self, Other) -> Bool`](/documentation/swift/uint/==(_:_:)-1zalq)Returns a Boolean value indicating whether the two given values are equal.[`static func | (Self, Self) -> Self`](/documentation/swift/uint/_(_:_:)-1e0ey)Returns the result of performing a bitwise OR operation on the two given values.[`static func / (UInt, UInt) -> UInt`](/documentation/swift/uint/_(_:_:)-1w9sv)Returns the quotient of dividing the first value by the second.[`static func ^ (Self, Self) -> Self`](/documentation/swift/uint/_(_:_:)-2yuuu)Returns the result of performing a bitwise XOR operation on the two given values.[`static func < <Other>(Self, Other) -> Bool`](/documentation/swift/uint/_(_:_:)-3r6zk)Returns a Boolean value indicating whether the value of the first argument is less than that of the second argument.[`static func > (Self, Self) -> Bool`](/documentation/swift/uint/_(_:_:)-4e53m)[`static func % (UInt, UInt) -> UInt`](/documentation/swift/uint/_(_:_:)-5hyxb)Returns the remainder of dividing the first value by the second.[`static func | (UInt, UInt) -> UInt`](/documentation/swift/uint/_(_:_:)-70g4r)Returns the result of performing a bitwise OR operation on the two given values.[`static func > <Other>(Self, Other) -> Bool`](/documentation/swift/uint/_(_:_:)-7d589)Returns a Boolean value indicating whether the value of the first argument is greater than that of the second argument.[`static func ^ (UInt, UInt) -> UInt`](/documentation/swift/uint/_(_:_:)-e9z4)Returns the result of performing a bitwise XOR operation on the two given values.[`static func <= (Self, Self) -> Bool`](/documentation/swift/uint/_=(_:_:)-6cfcm)[`static func >= (Self, Self) -> Bool`](/documentation/swift/uint/_=(_:_:)-7tms1)[`static func >= <Other>(Self, Other) -> Bool`](/documentation/swift/uint/_=(_:_:)-7v58u)Returns a Boolean value indicating whether the value of the first argument is greater than or equal to that of the second argument.[`static func <= <Other>(Self, Other) -> Bool`](/documentation/swift/uint/_=(_:_:)-yeqy)Returns a Boolean value indicating whether the value of the first argument is less than or equal to that of the second argument.[`static func << <RHS>(Self, RHS) -> Self`](/documentation/swift/uint/__(_:_:)-2xfje)Returns the result of shifting a value’s binary representation the specified number of digits to the left.[`static func << <Other>(Self, Other) -> Self`](/documentation/swift/uint/__(_:_:)-60q9j)Returns the result of shifting a value’s binary representation the specified number of digits to the left.[`static func >> <Other>(Self, Other) -> Self`](/documentation/swift/uint/__(_:_:)-635q0)Returns the result of shifting a value’s binary representation the specified number of digits to the right.[`static func >> <RHS>(Self, RHS) -> Self`](/documentation/swift/uint/__(_:_:)-97tkd)Returns the result of shifting a value’s binary representation the specified number of digits to the right.[`static func <<= <Other>(inout Self, Other)`](/documentation/swift/uint/__=(_:_:)-66xfr)Stores the result of shifting a value’s binary representation the specified number of digits to the left in the left-hand-side variable.[`static func >>= <Other>(inout Self, Other)`](/documentation/swift/uint/__=(_:_:)-9p0cx)Stores the result of shifting a value’s binary representation the specified number of digits to the right in the left-hand-side variable.[`static func ~ (Self) -> Self`](/documentation/swift/uint/~(_:))Returns the inverse of the bits set in the argument.### [Initializers](/documentation/Swift/UInt/BinaryInteger-Implementations#Initializers)

[`init()`](/documentation/swift/uint/init())Creates a new value equal to zero.[`init<Other>(clamping: Other)`](/documentation/swift/uint/init(clamping:))Creates a new instance with the representable value that’s closest to the given integer.[`init<T>(truncatingIfNeeded: T)`](/documentation/swift/uint/init(truncatingifneeded:))Creates a new instance from the bit pattern of the given instance by sign-extending or truncating to fit this type.### [Instance Properties](/documentation/Swift/UInt/BinaryInteger-Implementations#Instance-Properties)

[`var bitWidth: Int`](/documentation/swift/uint/bitwidth-swift.property)The number of bits in the current binary representation of this value.[`var description: String`](/documentation/swift/uint/description)A textual representation of this value.### [Instance Methods](/documentation/Swift/UInt/BinaryInteger-Implementations#Instance-Methods)

[`func advanced(by: Int) -> Self`](/documentation/swift/uint/advanced(by:))Returns a value that is offset the specified distance from this value.[`func distance(to: Self) -> Int`](/documentation/swift/uint/distance(to:))Returns the distance from this value to the given value, expressed as a stride.[`func isMultiple(of: Self) -> Bool`](/documentation/swift/uint/ismultiple(of:))Returns `true` if this value is a multiple of the given value, and `false` otherwise.[`func quotientAndRemainder(dividingBy: Self) -> (quotient: Self, remainder: Self)`](/documentation/swift/uint/quotientandremainder(dividingby:))Returns the quotient and remainder of this value divided by the given value.
